title: That's "Mr." To You
body_text:
How much more could possibly happen in this already-memorable 16th Season!? The
final fight
between long-time adversaries Ryan Letsche and Grant Cornero, a brutal
"Brother vs. Brother"
confrontation featuring the Fitzpatricks, the hotly-contested eighth
Wall/All
meeting, and the wet, wild
3YA
celebration. Phew, that's one awesome start and we're only half way through the season!
DODGEBALL 155 Main Event!
DODGEBALL CXL:
Family Affair
in late-May unshered in these so-called "family fun" days and since, beloved relatives and close personal friends have taken time out of their schedules just to get a glimpse of the now three-year "local phenomenon". Because of the overwhelming turnouts, support, and overall success,
EastCoastDodgeball's
backstage crew just had to come up with this most-fitting attraction.
All diehard dodgeballers are urged to attend ECD's inaugural
Father/Son
team contest! Wily veteran and multi-time award winner
Dan Spengeman
and his cunning father
Mr. Spengeman
take on the combination of the fearless
Bob Cornero
and his athletically-blessed pops
Mr. Cornero
! Quite possibly the biggest, most exciting midseason showdown ever and it all goes down September 13 beginning at 7:15PM only at Wall High School!
body_html:
How much more could possibly happen in this already-memorable 16th Season!? The final fight between long-time adversaries Ryan Letsche and Grant Cornero, a brutal "Brother vs. Brother" confrontation featuring the Fitzpatricks, the hotly-contested eighth Wall/All meeting, and the wet, wild 3YA celebration. Phew, that's one awesome start and we're only half way through the season!

DODGEBALL 155 Main Event!
DODGEBALL CXL: Family Affair in late-May unshered in these so-called "family fun" days and since, beloved relatives and close personal friends have taken time out of their schedules just to get a glimpse of the now three-year "local phenomenon". Because of the overwhelming turnouts, support, and overall success, EastCoastDodgeball's backstage crew just had to come up with this most-fitting attraction.

All diehard dodgeballers are urged to attend ECD's inaugural Father/Son team contest! Wily veteran and multi-time award winner Dan Spengeman and his cunning father Mr. Spengeman take on the combination of the fearless Bob Cornero and his athletically-blessed pops Mr. Cornero! Quite possibly the biggest, most exciting midseason showdown ever and it all goes down September 13 beginning at 7:15PM only at Wall High School!
